H0.text: In which city does the action of the Shakespeare play Measure for Measure take place. Venice

H1.text: In which city does the action of the Shakespeare play Measure for Measure take place. Florence

H2.text: In which city does the action of the Shakespeare play Measure for Measure take place. Rome

H3.text: In which city does the action of the Shakespeare play Measure for Measure take place. Wien

A4.text: The play centres on the despotic and puritan Angelo, a deputy entrusted to rule the city of Vienna

A5.text: Vincentio, the Duke of Vienna, must leave the city on a diplomatic mission.
